snippet.title: Sonic Colors: DS Trailer
snippet.description:
This Sonic Colors trailer introduces two new Color Powers exclusive to the Nintendo DS version of SEGAs next Sonic game.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
